<!-- This file was @generated by `just docgen-kit-std`. -->

Implements typechecking instance attributes.

## Functions

### attribute

```luau
function KitStdAttributes.attribute(
	name: string,
	check: t.check<T>): ()
```

Returns methods to typecheck and get an attribute from an instance.

#### Parameters

##### name <small>`: string`</small>

The name of the attribute to check

##### check <small>`: t.check<T>`</small>

The typechecker to use.
